GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of a single article

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of a single article with increased votes

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a single article
